snippet.title: Steps and Turns
snippet.description:
Simplicity making complexity. In one word: Emergence.
Make a step. Turn a certain angle. Make two steps. Turn again the same angle. Make three steps. And go on.
You might make a kind of spiral. But if the angle gets bigger, what might happen? Some corners might get visible.
And if each line you describe with each angle is put into an animation, what kind of dance do you get?
What will you see? Triangles? Squares? Stars?
But remember, this is only one line.
Animation made with FMS Logo.
